column3: Hɔn a worisi no wɔberɛ kwa: Sɛ EWURADZE annweɔn kurow no a
column4: Ɔweɔmfo no si ho pe kwa."

column3: na hom nngye hom ahom papa biara
column5: Na hom berɛ ana hom enya edziban: Naaso
column7: mpo wɔ ber a nna wɔadeda."

column3: mba yɛ akyɛdze a ofi EWURADZE hɔ: Na wɔyɛ nhyira mapa."

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ nyimpa katakyi ne nsamu egyen menaba tse no
column3: Dɛmara na mberantsɛber mu mba tse."

column2: "Ɔhomkanyi nye nyimpa a ɔahyɛ hɔn n’egyen kotoku ma; Na n’enyim nnkogu ase da
column3: Ber a ɔnye atamfo bɛkasa wɔ baguamu no."
